Uses of Class
thProver.Variable

  • Packages that use Variable 
    Package Description
    thProver  

    • Uses of Variable in thProver

      Methods in thProver that return Variable 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Variable CNFFormula.addVariable(java.lang.String var)
      Costruct a new variable if the symbol representing the variable is never used yet and return it, otherwise return the variable costructed before with that symbol and return it (note: save space) In case of new variable save it in terms for the future.
      Methods in thProver that return types with arguments of type Variable 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Map<Variable,Term> Substitution.getAssignments()
      Return the Map of the assignments.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Variable> Substitution.renameVariables(long time)
      Rename the variable symbols with a new index
